articles.title: Election Commission to announce Lok Sabha election schedule tomorrow - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Lok Sabha Election 2024 date: The announcement will made during a press conference at 3 pm. | Latest News India
articles.content:
Lok Sabha election 2024 date: The Election Commission on Friday said that it will announce the schedule for the Lok Sabha elections and some state assemblies tomorrow.

articles.title: Kerala holds voting for Russian presidential elections - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Russia's presidential elections began today, and citizens will cast their votes till Sunday across the nation's 11 time zones. | World News
articles.content: Russian citizens residing in Kerala cast their votes for the Russian presidential elections at the booth specifically arranged at the Honorary Consulate of the Russian Federation, Russian House, in T… [+2748 chars]

articles.author: Alka Jain
articles.title: Gyanesh Kumar, Sukhbir Singh Sandhu take charge as Election Commissioners today | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Newly-appointed Election Commissioners Gyanesh Kumar and Sukhbir Singh Sandhu to assume office today after being selected by PM Narendra Modi on Thursday.
articles.content: The newly-appointed Election Commissioners Gyanesh Kumar and Sukhbir Singh Sandhu took charge of the office today, Friday. They were appointed election commissioners by the selection panel chaired by… [+2498 chars]

articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: What Kovind-led panel has proposed if there's Hung Parliament or assembly - Moneycontrol
articles.description: It said that in the event of hung assembly or no-confidence motion, fresh elections can be held for the remainder of the five-year tenure.
articles.content:
A high-level panel headed by former President Ramnath Kovind has submitted its report on "one nation, one election" to President Droupadi Murmu.
